Reviews.Title: well packaged
Reviews.Author: roger abifadel
Reviews.Content: the unit is brand new was able to added to my Verizon account with no data required as promised.will recommend this seller and the product.

Reviews.Title: feedback
Reviews.Author: Kelly Roe
Reviews.Content: Had one before, so I knew what to expect. Meets all my needs. Phone was good choice. Wasn't to sure about previously owned by it's fine

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: I'm pleased with this purchase. I bought the phone for my husband and he likes it. He's old-school and likes the keypad type phones. It's simple and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Arrived quickly, working fine.
Reviews.Author: Janice Kuch
Reviews.Content: Came very quickly.  Appreciated that since replacing a broken phone.  Have had no problems with it.  Was able to activate it quickly and saved a great deal versus purchasing through carrier.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Geri A. Redmon
Reviews.Content: Product arrived just as promised.  Condition was just as advertised.  I would definitely buy from this seller in the future.
